entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of snow near the Ogilvie mountains overnight. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains. Amount 5 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
